description.fr:
Lorsque votre héros traverse un adversaire ayant un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}\_: Pose un {FloorMechanism:282} jusqu'à {cell:c} de l'adversaire traversé.
\---
<rem>L'état élémentaire n'est pas consommé.</rem>
description.en:
When your hero goes through an opponent with an {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}: Places one {FloorMechanism:282} up to {cell:c} from the opponent gone through.
\---
<rem>The elemental state is not consumed.</rem>
description.es:
Cuando tu héroe atraviesa a un adversario que tenga un {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}: Pone un {FloorMechanism:282} hasta a {cell:c} del adversario atravesado.
\---
<rem>El estado elemental no se consume.</rem>
description.de:
Wenn dein Held einen Gegner mit einem {%ELEMENTARY_STATE} überquert: Platziert ein\_{FloorMechanism:282} bis zu {cell:c} vom überquerten Gegner entfernt.
\---
<rem>Der Elementarzustand wird nicht verbraucht.</rem>
description.pt:
Quando seu herói atravessa um adversário que tenha um {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}: Coloca um {FloorMechanism:282} a até {cell:c} do adversário atravessado.
\---
<rem>O estado elementar não é consumido.</rem>
